welcome_message_body: Welcome to Campina Grande, the city known for its lively culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Joao Suassuna Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Joao Suassuna Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
